title: Hero MotoCorp names Reema Jain as Chief Information & Digital Officer
description: Hero MotoCorp has appointed Reema Jain as the new Chief Information & Digital Officer to lead the technology-driven business transformation. She will strengthen the company's initiatives such as IT-related infrastructure, strategic planning, aligning digital strategies including the usage of new-age technologies.
